newsitem.title: GERMANY: W.German cap utilisation rose in first quarter - Ifo.
newsitem.headline: W.German cap utilisation rose in first quarter - Ifo.

text.p: Capacity utilisation in the west German manufacturing sector was 84.9 percent in March, up from 83.2 percent in December, the Ifo economic research institute said on Thursday.
Ifo conducts a quarterly survey of capacity utilisation and will release details of the survey next week, an Ifo official said in response to a Reuter enquiry.

Ifo earlier said its business climate index for west Germany fell to 92.4 in March from 93.6 in February but economists said the decline was likely to be temporary and predicted the index would rise in coming months.
